Welcome to the website of *Spatial Microsimulation with R*, a book about modelling individual-level data within administrative zones. The aim is to provide an introduction to the topic, with practical examples implemented in the powerful statistical software R.

This book is in preparation for publication in CRC Press's [R series](http://www.crcpress.com/browse/series/crctherser). This wiki serves as a place explore the topics covered and allows instant access to updates. It also allows anyone
with a [GitHub account](https://github.com/join) to contribute.

For people wanting the entire book in one document, an [up-to-date pdf document is available at the following permalink:](https://www.dropbox.com/s/gaf9dnm26uoxy4i/book.pdf?dl=0). If you have any questions or feedback, please get in touch via email: r.lovelace@leeds.ac.uk .
